sub_title: Innovation | Transformation & Change Management | Cross-Cultural Leadership | Alliances & Partnerships
summary:
A portfolio, program and operations management lead who has demonstrated successful, large-scale project implementation and change management within some of the best names in technology.  
International experiences include digital transformation (e.g. ERP, CRM, CLM) - towards business process redesign, implementation of cloud-based solutions, sales & procurement negotiations, strategy & planning, partner & alliance management, budget & AOP management, and customer & partner services.
